pageContext.claim: “In Madison, 17,000 votes were deposited in so-called human drop boxes. You know what that is, right? Where operatives stuff thousands of unsecured ballots into duffle bags on park benches across the city, in complete defiance of cease and desist letters from state legislature.”
pageContext.analysis: Ballot harvesting is legal in Wisconsin. Trump is referring to 'Democracy in the Park' events held in Madison city parks before Election Day. In November, the Dane County Board of Canvassers rejected the Trump campaign's objection to those votes by a 2-1 vote following a brief hearing.
